ygData.subject: Boots, time, and mana song
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, a nice lady in my guild did the Watchman boot quest and said they were black plate, then a person here said they look like silver plate.  I guess the
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, a nice lady in my guild did the Watchman boot quest and said they were black
plate, then a person here said they look like silver plate. I guess the best
confirmation is my own eyes =).

On a related note, given that the Watchman boot quest has to be started on a
particular day/time in game, I need to remind myself of the conversion from Earth to
Norrathian time. Last time I payed a lot of attention was trying to predict the
time of sunrise in North Karana so as to schedule a wedding =). Notice that Norrath
doesn't rotate on its axis hehe.

I looked around for information on charred boots and was kind of surprised not to
find any. I would guess they drop in Sol A based on the name and the increase to
fire reist. Could someone help me out here please?

Regarding mana song: have we chatted about its effect on casting cost? Anyone done
tests?


//Maravana Vireo
//50th Bard of the Jus Divinum
//Mithaniel Marr
